title: Ghost Bride Morgana's bind is really hard almost impossible to see when she shoots it.
body: I've been playing against this really annoying skin lately and I've noticed that the Ghost Bride Morgana skin is really hard to see, this really annoys me when i'm playing as a squishy ADC, so pls rito fix, thank you!

replies.body: Thanks for the report! This is a known issue, and we're working to make it more readable, especially on lower graphics settings. :D

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=eEdyosjn,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-18T21:38:12.776+0000)
>
> Thanks for the report! This is a known issue, and we're working to make it more readable, especially on lower graphics settings. :D

Could you also look into fixing Steel Legion lux's spells too? :/ they are really hard to see as well
So, underworld TF card, steel legion lux ult and snow day ziggs mine (on HA) are gonne be more visible too or it's just target at one unfair skin to face?

This has been brought up before but nothing has been done about it. Which in my opinion is a big problem, skin should not make the abilities harder to read and more transparent abillities on skins almost always do this.
